Class VcfFileSegmentGenerator

java.lang.Object
  picard.vcf.processor.VcfFileSegmentGenerator

public abstract class VcfFileSegmentGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

Describes a mechanism for producing VcfFileSegments from a VCF file.
